title: Hey you!!!!!!
description: Do you want to proceed with the game?

title: Deadline
description: There is a deadline, do you push without testing?

title: QA Found a bug
description: Do you fix it immediately or put it in backlog?
cancel: All bugs should rot in backlog

title: You encountered implementation issue
description: Do you hack it to save time or take the longer route?
cancel: My code has zero technical debt

title: You heard a black humour joke the day before
description: Do you tell it in front of the colleagues?

title: You got drunk and lost your Mac
description: Do you admit to Moroa you lost it or say someone stole it?
